Class OfficerProjectApplicationController

java.lang.Object
sg.edu.ntu.sc2002.ay2425.fcsdGroup2.controller.OfficerProjectApplicationController
public class OfficerProjectApplicationController extends Object
Controller class for managing officer project applications. Handles adding, updating, deleting, and retrieving officer project applications.

    • processOfficerDecision

      public boolean processOfficerDecision(OfficerProjectApplication application, boolean approve)
      Processes an officer project application decision (approve or reject).
      Parameters:
      application - the application to process
      approve - true to approve, false to reject
      Returns:
      true if processed successfully

    • getApplicationsByProjectId

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      list of officer applications

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      list of applications
